forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 57F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...thunderstorms developing late. Low 53F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.
